refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: &name; is a broker for the App message-passing protocol. It translates an interface definition file into a C header file, suitable as a reference while implementing an AppServer.

refsect1.title: Options
refsect1.para: &name; expects a specification file to be specified on the command line. The following option is available:

varlistentry.para: Generate a file suitable for a client.
Generate a file suitable for a server. This is the default behavior.
